chapters.description: Understand core concepts, threats, and types of attacks.
chapters.goal: Define key cybersecurity terms and identify common cyber threats.
chapters.mini_project: Create a cybersecurity awareness poster highlighting common threats.

chapters.description: Explore network protocols, firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and VPNs.
chapters.goal: Explain how firewalls and other network security tools function.
chapters.mini_project: Configure a basic firewall rule on a virtual network.

chapters.description: Learn about hardening techniques, user permissions, and common vulnerabilities.
chapters.goal: Implement basic security best practices on a Linux or Windows system.
chapters.mini_project: Hardening a virtual machine by disabling unnecessary services and configuring user permissions.

chapters.description: Understand OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities and how to prevent them.
chapters.mini_project: Analyze a simple web application for potential vulnerabilities.

chapters.description: Learn about different types of XSS attacks and how to protect against them.
chapters.goal: Implement XSS prevention techniques in web applications.
chapters.mini_project: Build a basic web application and implement XSS prevention measures.

chapters.description: Understand SQL injection vulnerabilities and learn how to prevent them.
chapters.goal: Implement SQL injection prevention techniques in web applications.
chapters.mini_project: Build a web application with a database and implement SQL injection prevention measures.

chapters.description: Explore common security tools like Nmap, Wireshark, and Metasploit.
chapters.goal: Understand the purpose and functionality of basic security tools.
chapters.mini_project: Use Nmap to scan a simple network for open ports.

chapters.description: Learn to analyze network traffic using Wireshark.
chapters.goal: Identify protocols, analyze packets, and troubleshoot network issues.
chapters.mini_project: Analyze network traffic and identify suspicious activities.

chapters.description: Learn about vulnerability scanners and how to perform scans.
chapters.goal: Identify vulnerabilities in systems and applications.
chapters.mini_project: Perform a vulnerability scan on a virtual machine.

chapters.description: Understand the principles and methodologies of ethical hacking.
chapters.goal: Define ethical hacking and its role in cybersecurity.
chapters.mini_project: Create a basic penetration testing plan.

chapters.description: Learn about reconnaissance techniques and network scanning tools.
chapters.goal: Gather information about target systems and identify vulnerabilities.
chapters.mini_project: Perform reconnaissance on a target network and identify potential vulnerabilities.

chapters.description: Explore common vulnerabilities and learn how to exploit them.
chapters.goal: Understand how to exploit vulnerabilities and gain access to systems.
chapters.mini_project: Simulate a basic exploitation scenario using a vulnerable web application.
